answers.answer: Hi there. Focal hyperhidrosis can be primary idiopathic when there is no apparent cause and secondary to obesity, gout, menopause, a tumor, diabetes mellitus,hyperthyroidism. certain measures can be tried like anti perspirants, clothing like nylon worsen symptoms, avoid triggers like certain foods and drinks.certain treatment options are iontophoresis in a dermatology clinic, botulinum toxin, anticholinergics.  endoscopic thoracic sympathetectomy is a surgical option used when medical options fail. Take care
